converse: YOU: Hello brother how is it going
Person 1: Nothing much. Alive somehow. Why do you ask
YOU: What do you mean alive some how ? did something happen ?
Person 2: Well yes of course, yesterday my family has been captured while we were out for work
YOU: Really ? are 'they' really doing this in the wild ?
Person 2: Why wouldn't they ? I won't be surprised even if they kill someone
Person 1: They've become this worst. You can ask aroundd, you'll see more of it
YOU: Of course. I am here to do just that
YOU: Hey brother, why are you alone here ?
Person 3: I am trying to hide
Person 3: You see, I took a loan for medical expences,since things are quite expensive
Person 3: But now they are asking for 10 times more money. I can't even pay my own bills, so how can I . . .
